dublin_core.dcvalue: With its patients scattered throughout Central Texas a region roughly the size of Massachusetts Scott and White Memorial Hospital and Clinic based in Temple Texas has turned to telemedicine to help bring healthcare to underserved areas Gregory Hobbs M D left Scott and White s director of telehealth has overseen steady growth in the hospital s telemedicine services which now support five clinics five regional hospitals and five rural clinics outside of the network
Monitoring a good opportunity. Telemedicine grows as method to reach poorly served regions.
